query:
SELECT 
            u.id,
            u.username,
            u.follower_count,
            EXISTS(
                SELECT 1 FROM follows f2
                WHERE f2.follower_id = $2 AND f2.following_id = u.id
            ) as "is_following!"
        FROM follows f
        JOIN users u ON f.follower_id = u.id
        WHERE f.following_id = $1
        ORDER BY f.created_at DESC
